ygData.subject: Re: SV: [EverQuest] Verant's new security policy..
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you interested.. I took the trouble of looking up the actual policy that was resented posted by Verant reguarding compormised accounts. Its posted
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you interested.. I took the trouble of looking up the actual policy that was resented posted by Verant reguarding compormised accounts. Its posted here.  Talk about being taken out of context.   Heres the part you have been over looking:

 Prior to banning any accounts reported as compromised, we will conduct a thorough review of the accounts in question and determine the appropriate course of action on those accounts. Accounts will only be banned based on information gathered through our investigation and not merely as a result of external allegations.

D.
